Text:
Because the cover for the sequel, Stardust, is included, I thought that this DVD might include both films, but it's only That'll Be The Day. Any chance of a DVD for Stardust? (I've searched the site, and there are quite a few, but they all seem to be set in "a countryside town bordering on a magical land") 
Tack :-)

It would be great to see the sequel, Stardust

That'll be the Day: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0070788/ 

Stardust: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0072201/
